page.title: 13RELIGION IN EASTLEIGH
page.content: Christianity is the main religion in Eastleigh with many groups worshipping in their own buildings.Member churches of the council of churches include the Anglicans,Methodists,Baptists,Emmanuel Baptists,Roman Catholics,United Reformed Churches and The Salvation Army who unite regularily to further ecumenical worship. It is noteworthy that the Roman Catholic Church hold a Mass in Polish every Sunday. Also worshipping in Eastleigh are the Elim Pentecostalists,the Community Church and The Brethren. Other religions are also represented in Eastleigh. A small Sikh community meet regularily at the Crestwood Centre for worship,as do a small enclosed Jewish order. A very small number of Hindu and Moslem families worship in their own homes.
